name: Chromatic
description: An original and challenging survival arcade game with a color twist ! Your Chromacore is stranded in the depths of space and the only way to survive is to show to the universe the True Rainbow Power!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or newer Processor: Dual Core @ 1.5 GHz + Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X compatible GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: Controller required for Co-op mode
